languages.text: {n}Мужчина окидывает суровым взором трущобы.{/n} "Пусть каждому послужит уроком мое покаяние, псы и псицы нечестивые! Служить Лорд-капитану должны мы и словом, и делом, и жизнью — да вот не услужили, порочные! Каюсь. И отдаю себя в руки {mf|Его|Ее} Светлости".

{n}His stern gaze sweeps the slums.{/n} "Let my repentance be a lesson to each of you faithless dogs! We must serve the Lord Captain with our words and our deeds and our lives — but our nature is corrupt and we have failed in our service! I repent and commit myself into {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}'s hands."
languages.original_text: {n}Мужчина окидывает суровым взором трущобы.{/n} "Пусть каждому послужит уроком мое покаяние, псы и псицы нечестивые! Служить Лорд-капитану должны мы и словом, и делом, и жизнью — да вот не услужили, порочные! Каюсь. И отдаю себя в руки {mf|Его|Ее} Светлости".

We must serve the Lord Captain with our words and our deeds and our lives — but our nature is corrupt and we've failed in our service! I repent and commit myself into {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}'s hands."

languages.text: {n}Su mirada severa recorre el suburbio.{/n} «¡Que mi arrepentimiento sea una lección para todos vosotros, perros infieles! ¡Debemos servir a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán con nuestras palabras, nuestros actos y nuestras vidas, pero nuestra naturaleza corrupta nos ha llevado a fallar en nuestro servicio! Me arrepiento y me entrego libremente a la voluntad de mi{mf|lord|lady}».
languages.original_text: {n}His stern gaze sweeps the slums.{/n} "Let my repentance be a lesson to each of you faithless dogs! We must serve the Lord Captain with our words and our deeds and our lives — but our nature is corrupt and we have failed in our service! I repent and commit myself into {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}'s hands."

traits.locale_text: {n}Su mirada severa recorre el suburbio.{/n} «¡Que mi arrepentimiento sea una lección para todos vosotros, perros infieles! ¡Debemos servir a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán con nuestras palabras, nuestros actos y nuestras vidas, pero nuestra naturaleza corrupta nos ha llevado a fallar en nuestro servicio! Me arrepiento y me entrego libremente a la voluntad de mi{mf|lord|lady}».

languages.text: {n}彼は厳しい視線でスラム街を一望する。{/n}「この悔い改めを、信仰心を持たぬ犬どもへの教訓としてやる！俺らは言葉で、行動で、生活で、ロード・キャプテンにお仕えせねばならん。だが、その本性は堕落していて、務めをこなせなかった！私は悔い改め、陛下のお手に身を委ねます」
languages.original_text: {n}His stern gaze sweeps the slums.{/n} "Let my repentance be a lesson to each of you faithless dogs! We must serve the Lord Captain with our words and our deeds and our lives — but our nature is corrupt and we have failed in our service! I repent and commit myself into {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}'s hands."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼は厳しい視線でスラム街を一望する。{/n}「この悔い改めを、信仰心を持たぬ犬どもへの教訓としてやる！俺らは言葉で、行動で、生活で、ロード・キャプテンにお仕えせねばならん。だが、その本性は堕落していて、務めをこなせなかった！私は悔い改め、陛下のお手に身を委ねます」

languages.text: {n}他严厉的目光扫过了贫民窟。{/n}“那群不忠不义的王八蛋！让我的忏悔成为你们的教训吧！我们必须用言语、行动和性命来侍奉舰长大人，可我们的本性实在是太败坏了！我们辜负了舰长大人！我在此忏悔，我愿意把我自己的性命交到大人您手里。”
languages.original_text: {n}His stern gaze sweeps the slums.{/n} "Let my repentance be a lesson to each of you faithless dogs! We must serve the Lord Captain with our words and our deeds and our lives — but our nature is corrupt and we have failed in our service! I repent and commit myself into {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}'s hands."

traits.locale_text: {n}他严厉的目光扫过了贫民窟。{/n}“那群不忠不义的王八蛋！让我的忏悔成为你们的教训吧！我们必须用言语、行动和性命来侍奉舰长大人，可我们的本性实在是太败坏了！我们辜负了舰长大人！我在此忏悔，我愿意把我自己的性命交到大人您手里。”

languages.text: {n}Sein ernster Blick schweift über die Slums.{/n} "Lasst meine Buße Euch ungläubigen Hunden alle eine Lektion sein! Wir müssen dem Lord Captain mit unseren Worten und Taten und unserem Leben dienen – aber wir sind von Natur aus korrupt und haben deshalb versagt! Ich bereue und liefere mich den Händen {mf|Seiner Lordschaft|Ihrer Ladyschaft} aus."
languages.original_text: {n}His stern gaze sweeps the slums.{/n} "Let my repentance be a lesson to each of you faithless dogs! We must serve the Lord Captain with our words and our deeds and our lives — but our nature is corrupt and we have failed in our service! I repent and commit myself into {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}'s hands."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sein ernster Blick schweift über die Slums.{/n} "Lasst meine Buße Euch ungläubigen Hunden alle eine Lektion sein! Wir müssen dem Lord Captain mit unseren Worten und Taten und unserem Leben dienen – aber wir sind von Natur aus korrupt und haben deshalb versagt! Ich bereue und liefere mich den Händen {mf|Seiner Lordschaft|Ihrer Ladyschaft} aus."

languages.text: {n}Il promène son regard sévère sur les bas quartiers.{/n} « Que mon repentir serve de leçon à chacun d'entre vous, bande de chiens sans foi ni loi ! Nous devons servir {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}, que ce soit avec nos paroles, nos actes ou même nos vies... mais notre nature est corrompue, et nous avons échoué ! Je me repens et m'en remets à Sa Seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: {n}His stern gaze sweeps the slums.{/n} "Let my repentance be a lesson to each of you faithless dogs! We must serve the Lord Captain with our words and our deeds and our lives — but our nature is corrupt and we have failed in our service! I repent and commit myself into {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}'s hands."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il promène son regard sévère sur les bas quartiers.{/n} « Que mon repentir serve de leçon à chacun d'entre vous, bande de chiens sans foi ni loi ! Je me repens et m'en remets à Sa Seigneurie. »

languages.text: {n}Sert bakışlarıyla kenar mahalleyi süzüyor.{/n} "Tövbelerim, inançsız itlerin topuna ibret olsun! Lord Kaptan'a sözlerimizle, eylemlerimizle ve hayatlarımızla hizmet etmeliyiz. Fakat tabiatımız yoz, hizmetimizde de kusur ettik! Tövbe edip kendimi {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin ellerine bırakıyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}His stern gaze sweeps the slums.{/n} "Let my repentance be a lesson to each of you faithless dogs! We must serve the Lord Captain with our words and our deeds and our lives — but our nature is corrupt and we have failed in our service! I repent and commit myself into {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}'s hands."
